plays.text: Penalty to Boyd Devereaux 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Corey Schwab
Penalty to Mats Sundin 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Jason Williams
Goal scored by Jason Williams assisted by Chris Chelios and Igor Larionov
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Tripping Jason Williams
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Brendan Shanahan and Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Shayne Corson 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Pavel Datsyuk and Nicklas Lidstrom
Penalty to Igor Larionov 2 minutes for Crosschecking Paul Healey
Penalty to Brendan Shanahan 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Gary Roberts
Penalty to Bryan McCabe 2 minutes for Interference Jason Williams
Penalty to Marc Moro 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Sean Avery served by Trevor Linden
Goal scored by Igor Larionov assisted by Pavel Datsyuk and Brett Hull
Penalty to Chris Chelios 2 minutes for Tripping Tie Domi
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice
Goal scored by Tomas Kaberle assisted by Bryan McCabe and Jonas Hoglund
Penalty to Cory Cross 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Mats Sundin unassisted
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov unassisted
Goal scored by Sean Avery assisted by Kirk Maltby and Nicklas Lidstrom
